response.overview: A group of young people go out to the countryside to rent a cottage and chill for a couple of days. They are shown around by the gardener Ernst, who has won many fine prizes and received diplomas for his fine flowers, etc. Suddenly a group of squatters and squatters appear, they ruin the atmosphere with havoc and chatter. Ernst freaks out and the slaughter can beginâ€¦
response.title: The Blomster Monster
